thread.title: Future is in attendance for Falcons game
thread.title_full: Future is in attendance for Falcons game

author: USA TODAY
title: Future is in attendance for Falcons game
text:
Future is in attendance for Falcons game All that talk this week about whether the Atlanta Falcons and their DJ would play Future songs as... Post to Facebook Future is in attendance for Falcons game All that talk this week about whether the Atlanta Falcons and their DJ would play Future songs as...  //usat.ly/2ixaM1o   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Future is in attendance for Falcons game Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 4:17 p.m. ET Jan. 14, 2017 10 Shares 
INDIO, CA - APRIL 11: Rapper Future attends day 1 of the 2014 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival at the Empire Polo Club on April 11, 2014 in Indio, California. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images for Coachella) ORG XMIT: 479916533 ORIG FILE ID: 484315515 (Photo: Getty Images for Coachella) 
All that talk this week about whether the Atlanta Falcons and their DJ would play Future songs as a potential troll job on Seattle Seahawks QB Russell Wilson turned into something potentially more troll-y (sure, it's a word). 
Future - who was once engaged to Wilson's wife Ciara - is in attendance at Saturday's Falcons-Seahawks game: â€” Justin Felder (@Justin_FOX5) January 14, 2017 Future is here, Falcons fans https://t.co/IxT7Wwrnrz pic.twitter.com/xIrqSO24wU
